4.3 DUIM-DCs Module

brush-mode

Generic function

Summary

Returns an integer representing the drawing mode of a brush.

Signature

brush-mode brush => integer

Arguments

brush
An instance of type <brush>.

Values

integer
An instance of type <integer>. Default value: $boole-1.

Library

duim-dcs

Module

duim-dcs

Description

Returns an integer representing the drawing mode of brush.

See also

$boole-1, page 119.

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
